https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xjFGDRySadUKsqndrdgTNPKpHIg.jpg When the counselor of a halfway house, Daryl, agrees to let cameras film the residents for reality television, he soon realizes the show's "do anything for ratings" producer has some tricks up his sleeve. A Halfway House Christmas
